name: Apple
description: Owned any model First Generation, Series 1/2/3 Watch and reported battery swelling issues.

name: TikTok
description: Used TikTok before Sept 30, 2023 while under age 18 (or parent of minor who used TikTok).

name: Equifax
description: Had personal information exposed in the 2017 Equifax data breach.

name: Facebook Privacy
description: Facebook users in Illinois whose face appeared in a photo uploaded between June 7, 2011 and August 19, 2020.

name: Hyundai/Kia Engine
description: Owned or leased certain Hyundai or Kia vehicles with 2.0L or 2.4L engines manufactured between 2011-2019.

name: Roundup Weedkiller
description: Used Roundup products and later diagnosed with Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma or other specified cancers.

name: T-Mobile Data Breach
description: T-Mobile customer affected by the August 2021 data breach exposing personal information.

name: Neutrogena Sunscreen
description: Purchased Neutrogena or Aveeno sunscreen products between May 2017 and April 2021.

name: Capital One Data Breach
description: Capital One customers whose information was compromised in the 2019 data breach.

name: Robinhood Trading Restrictions
description: Robinhood users affected by the January 2021 trading restrictions on certain securities.

name: Uber Driver Misclassification
description: Worked as an Uber driver in California between February 2019 and December 2020.

name: LG Refrigerator Defect
description: Owned an LG refrigerator manufactured between January 2014 and December 2017 that experienced cooling issues.
